name: regen-mapping-murmurations-integration
description: Integration scripts for uploading unified schemas and profiles to Murmurations test network

scripts.test-integration: npm run upload-schemas && npm run upload-profiles && sleep 300 && npm run test-queries
scripts.build: echo 'Website files are ready in docs/ directory for GitHub Pages'
scripts.deploy: echo 'Push to GitHub to deploy via GitHub Pages'

author: Regen Mapping Project
